meanings.sent1: The opulency of the royal family was evident in their grand palace.
meanings.sent2: Her opulency allowed her to travel the world in luxury.
meanings.sent3: The opulency of the birthday party was so extravagant that even the pets had their own special treats.
meanings.sent4: The opulency of the mansion was like a shimmering jewel in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The opulency of the banquet hall was so overwhelming that guests felt like royalty.

meanings.definition: The state of being rich or luxurious.
meanings.sent1: The opulency of the hotel was unmatched, with gold-plated fixtures and marble floors.
meanings.sent2: Living in opulency, she surrounded herself with beautiful things.
meanings.sent3: The opulency of the cruise ship made even the stormy weather seem like a minor inconvenience.
meanings.sent4: In the opulency of the ballroom, she felt like a princess from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The opulency of the mansion was so breathtaking that it seemed like a dream come true.
